subject: fix: include projects.json in production build output
body:
projects.json was missing from the deployed site because it lived in
dashboard/ (not public/) and wasn't listed in the deploy workflow's
file copy step. Moved to dashboard/public/ so Vite includes it
automatically, and added it to deploy.yml as a safety net.

https://claude.ai/code/session_014Y95NoEwfZkakxyE9Z2372
title: include projects.json in production build output
